trans-unit.source: Provides the context for an <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" /> object.

An <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext> object is typically used to obtain a virtual path or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A> property for use with an expression builder.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext>物件通常用來取得虛擬檔案的路徑或<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A>屬性運算式產生器搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the file associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" /> 關聯的檔案之虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> class using the specified virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的虛擬路徑，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> to use with the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 與指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> 搭配使用的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> class using the specified template control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的樣板控制項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Provides an <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" /> object with a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供含有 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder" /> 物件的參考之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> that contains this expression.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" />。

trans-unit.source: An expression builder might require additional information about the containing page to evaluate or parse the expression value.
trans-unit.target: 運算式產生器可能需要以評估或剖析的運算式值包含頁面的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This also provides the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> object with information regarding the page that might be required.
trans-unit.target: 這也會提供<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder>頁面可能需要的相關資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: When an instance of a control is part of a control template, the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.TemplateControl%2A> property contains a reference to the containing control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的執行個體是控制項範本的一部分時<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.TemplateControl%2A>屬性包含包含控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: Returns a virtual path to the file associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> 物件關聯的檔案之虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the file associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext" /> 關聯的檔案之虛擬路徑。
